links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 911 [NB. link is dead]
formula: a(n) = 2*a(n-1) - a(n-2) + a(n-3) - a(n-4) (holds at least up to n = 1000 but is not known to hold in general).Empirical g.f.: -(4*x^3-x^2+3*x-5) / ((x-1)*(x^3+x-1)). - _Colin Barker_, Oct 07 2014
mathematica: PSE[a_,b_,n_] := Join[{x = a, y = b}, Table[z = Floor[y^2/x + 1/2]; x = y; y = z, {n}]]; A020711 = PSE[5,7,50] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 26 2011 *)
crossrefs: See A008776 for definitions of Pisot sequences.
author: _David W. Wilson_
